p: In addition, the FTIR spectrum of ZnONPs shows a peak at 550 cm −1 [ 195] or 478 cm −1 that can be attributed to the Zn–O bond [ 196, 211]. Another example demonstrates that during the FTIR analysis of CuNPs and TiO 2NPs, in addition to the shifts observed in the MeNPs spectra, some prominent peaks appear compared to leaf extract [ 202].
